document.full_text: potential presidential candidate donald trump, at or near the top of some recent polls of republican contenders, said he might release his tax returns when president barack obama produces a birth certificate.
document.title: trump: my tax returns for obama birth certificate
lines_and_colors: potential presidential candidate donald trump, at or near the top of some recent polls of republican contenders, said he might release his tax returns when president barack obama produces a birth certificate.
